episodes.title: Families begin to bury their loved ones who died in the Shakahola tragedy
episodes.description:
Families of those who died in the Shakahola tragedy have begun burying their loved ones.Among them is a family from Butere in Kakamega County, which lost six members in the incident. George Keye Okaka received the bodies of his wife and three children after months of waiting. Okaka says his wife joined Paul Makenzi’s sect in 2019, hoping to find spiritual guidance, but instead, it led to tragedy. He is still waiting for the identification of his two remaining children. Sixteen bodies have been released to families as the identification and burial process continues.

episodes.title: 2 church faithful die in Migori, 57 others rescued during standoff with security officers
episodes.description:
At least two bodies have been retrieved and 57 people rescued from a church compound in Opapo, Rongo, Migori County, following a violent standoff between church members and security officers. The confrontation arose at Melkio St Joseph Missions of Messiah Africa Church hit the headlines recently after a GSU officer died and was buried in the church compound.
